name: Number Wizard (Zamzee)
description:
This is a simple number guessing game created for the GameDev.tv Unity Beginner's course.  The game was created from their tutorial focusing on creating User Interfaces with Unity. The player thinks of a number and the Number Wizard Pigeon will guess it in a few tries.

I would highly recommend the GameDev.tv course that I learned how to make this game from: https://www.udemy.com/course/unitycourse/
